thread.title: BRIEF-Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Buy Research & Development Building For 137.0 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Buy Research & Development Building For 137.0 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - fujian cosunter pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT BUILDING FOR 137.0 MILLION YUAN ($21.67 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2F0l2b4 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3232 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
